review: This is the best book I have read in several years. Great plot and character development!
I really struggled to get through this book. Kept waiting for it to build but it just never quite did. Certainly not the worst book I have ever read but I wouldn't put it at the top of your pile!
The first ten or so chapters of this book are a challenge. The plot is very slow to develop. But if you stick with it you will be pleasantly suprised.
